column5: I see... Looks like the lock
If I remember correctly, didn't it say,

offer up this box in order of the seasons,
				with them changed as they should be...?
("If you wish to release the locks,
offer up this box in order of the seasons,
with them changed as they should be"...)
Now there is only one remaining.
Since the box is so small,
be the last one. Let's head
There used to be a giant block of ice here...
You are... Noi and the human?#0E
It seems that it is finally time
for me to be released from this prison.#0E
that power the barrier for me!
It seems that Zext has still
drained me of most of my power...
do is to leave this place.
But I only broke one of them...
It seems I have been a cause for concern.
...For that, I must say thanks to you.
you two, the more I see you
I do not care if it is complicated.
Tell me. Tell me how this came to be...
I see, so that masked man...
certainly that of the real Selam.
He took advantage of my disbelief,
He had a strong sense of justice, and
always fought to defend the weak...
He was just that kind of a person.
Even if he was the head of their race,
I doubt Selam would follow Zext...
If Selam isn't an imposter, then...
We are on a mission to restore
the world to its true form...
What exactly did he mean by that?
Just what are they trying to do...?
Nevertheless, forge on ahead, you two,
and inquire into their real intentions.
So this is your power, Algol...
As I am now with my powers stolen,
I will least be able to watch
Let us take care of it!
And now Algol will be fine.
To the continent of La Worg!

Cygna and Zext are in the Origin Continent. After them!
